siteMetadata.title: Mazen Emam
siteMetadata.description: Mazen Emam is a Software Engineer specializing in frontend development with 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications that drive business results. He helps companies enhance user experiences and operational efficiency through data-driven solutions, having contributed to platforms serving manufacturing, analytics, and recruitment sectors across MENA and Europe.
siteMetadata.author: Mazen Emam
siteMetadata.bio: This biography will be used in the footer area of an article and can contain some more details about the author.
